question: ‘Dr Syama Prasad Mookerjee Institute of Medical Sciences and Research’ has been set up by which institution?
explanation:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi inaugurated the Dr Syama Prasad Mookerjee Institute of Medical Sciences and Research at IIT Kharagpur via video conferencing.
It is a super speciality hospital, which has been set up by the Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur with support from the Union Ministry of Education. The MBBS programme would start from the academic year 2021-22 along with postgraduate and doctoral programmes.
